[Skip to main content](#__docusaurus_skipToContent_fallback)

# Cardano Developer Portal

Letâ€™s build together

[Get Started](/docs/get-started/)

[### Get Started

Get an overview of Cardano, understand the components, discover builder tools, learn technical concepts and connect to the developer community.](/docs/get-started/)

[### Integrate Cardano

Explore Cardano wallets and learn how to integrate Cardano into applications and websites.](/docs/integrate-cardano/)

[### Build with Transaction Metadata

Learn what transaction metadata is, how to add it to a transaction, how to view the metadata and what potential use cases are.](/docs/transaction-metadata/)

[### Discover Native Tokens

Read what native tokens are, how to mint them, ways to create NFT and why you don't need smart contracts for all this.](/docs/native-tokens/)

[### Create Smart Contracts

Discover Marlowe and Plutus and learn how to create smart contracts on Cardano.](/docs/smart-contracts/)

[### Participate in Governance

Governance is an essential topic that includes Cardano Improvement Proposals (CIP), project funding, voting, and network parameters.](/docs/governance/)

[### Operate a Stake Pool

Learn what it takes to become a Cardano stake pool operator from a technical and marketing perspective.](/docs/operate-a-stake-pool/)
